unnormalised: As per the circular issued by the Ministry of Education, the designation of Prof. Sharma has been officially changed to Dean of Research effective 01/07/2024. This change in title will be reflected in all official communications and documentation henceforth. Further, Dr. Kapoor's appointment as Head of Department (HOD) of Computer Science at IIT Delhi is confirmed. Both Prof. Sharma and Dr. Kapoor are requested to update their respective email signatures and letterheads accordingly.
normalised: As per the circular issued by the Ministry of Education, the designation of Professor Sharma has been officially changed to Dean of Research effective first July two thousand and twenty four. This change in title will be reflected in all official communications and documentation henceforth. Further, Doctor Kapoor's appointment as Head of Department (H-O-D) of Computer Science at I-I-T Delhi is confirmed. Both Professor Sharma and Doctor Kapoor are requested to update their respective email signatures and letterheads accordingly.
